content: @Adam Stacoviak I just started reading We are Legion this weekend and I'm already hooked! I'm only about a quarter of the way through, but I already love the book and it has sparked some curiousty in me that has me wanting to explore some new ideas.
Very cool! Share more as you make progress. Did you listen to that episode I did with Dennis? We didn’t spoil much if you haven’t.
I actually don't remember. I just queued it up to go back and listen again
